sources.title: Porky's Poppa (1938)
sources.description: Porky's cow, Bessie, gets into difficulties and doesn't give any milk. When Porky's Poppa gets a mechanical cow, Bessie shows her mettle.

metadata.Plot: We take a tour of Porky's Poppa's farm, to the tune of Old MacDonald. After meeting several animals, "on this farm, he has a mortgage" which he frets over, particularly since Bessie has stopped producing milk. Poppa orders an Acme milk producing robot, and the beast vs. machine battle is on.
metadata.Actors: Mel Blanc, Robert Clampett, Russ Powell
